channel.title: Comments on: Tony Chan, betting on the future

item.title: By: Summer Accomplishments and Activities | Off the Shelf
item.dc:creator: Summer Accomplishments and Activities | Off the Shelf
item.description: […] Susan Boone on Tony Chan, betting on the futu… […]

item.title: By: Margaret Hughes
item.dc:creator: Margaret Hughes
item.description: I hope you're enjoying your last week at the Library and good luck on your next adventure!
item.content:encoded: I hope you’re enjoying your last week at the Library and good luck on your next adventure!

item.title: By: Min-Lin Fang
item.dc:creator: Min-Lin Fang
item.description: Thank you for all your help! Best of luck, Tony!
item.content:encoded: Thank you for all your help! Best of luck, Tony!

item.title: By: Lucy Friedland
item.dc:creator: Lucy Friedland
item.description: You've always been a great help to me, Tony. Your smiling face will be missed.
item.content:encoded: You’ve always been a great help to me, Tony. Your smiling face will be missed.

item.title: By: Rebecca Tang
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Tang
item.description: Best of luck Tony! Thank you for all your help!
item.content:encoded: Best of luck Tony! Thank you for all your help!

item.title: By: Evans Whitaker
item.dc:creator: Evans Whitaker
item.description: Tony, thank you for all the help over my year and a half at UCSF! I appreciate your quiet, calm expertise.
item.content:encoded: Tony, thank you for all the help over my year and a half at UCSF! I appreciate your quiet, calm expertise.

item.title: By: Julia Kochi
item.dc:creator: Julia Kochi
item.description: Good luck, Tony! Thanks for all your help when I'd come into the Tech Commons in a panic!
item.content:encoded: Good luck, Tony! Thanks for all your help when I’d come into the Tech Commons in a panic!

item.title: By: Benjamin Stever
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Stever
item.description: Best of luck Tony! It's been a pleasure working alongside you.
item.content:encoded: Best of luck Tony! It’s been a pleasure working alongside you.

item.title: By: Sean Mcclelland
item.dc:creator: Sean Mcclelland
item.description: Good luck Tony, thanks for all the help over the past few years!
item.content:encoded: Good luck Tony, thanks for all the help over the past few years!
